title: 服务器只有插件指令能用！
author: 噬之魔皇
txt_content: 服务器只有插件指令能用，其它什么gamerule都用不了，提示：I'm sorry,but you do not have permission to perform this command,Please contact the server administrators if you believe that this is in error
